name: Abstract Oracle Hex
description:
What is this?

This Oracle Hex-Flower is a scene prompt tool and an abstract oracle for open-ended questions. It is CERAMIC-Strict and is played without dice or any random element.

Use the Abstract Oracle Hex to aid solo or shared-world play with a group. Share one Token between you and take turns moving the Token to adjacent hexes.

Scene Prompt

Place a Token on any hex to begin your adventure.

A token may be anything close to hand.

Use the symbol in your current hex as a prompt for the scene and move to any of the six adjacent hexes when the scene ends.

Cross over onto the opposite side of the hex-flower when you reach an edge.

Open-ended Question Oracle

Whenever you have a question that cannot be answered with a yes or no question, move to an adjacent hex and use the symbol to generate ideas. Think about what the symbol could represent in the context of the current story.
